title: hellllllllp me plz
body: when i lanch lol thay say connection to httpp server lost .please check internet connection is stable >and the http connection are not blocked by the firewall .

replies.body: I need relay help my account hack it. I can't login. it's say password wrong or username. I try it forgot password and username ,but I didn't receive any email from the game. pleases I need relay help.

Your network needs to reach the authentication server to grab your login info and get you in, but it seems like something is blocking out.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and auto-config your firewall settings just in case to double check.

Go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to help troubleshoot and rule out possibilities with local network issues.  Let me know if you have any questions on this!
